ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime.classes

Class ApplicationState

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime.classes.ApplicationState

  • public class ApplicationState
extends Application
    A static class used for managing the application's data in its current state.
    Author:
    Benjamin Holmwood

    • Method Detail

      • startup

        public static void startup(Context context)
        Run on startup of the application. Loads user's locally saved data and pushes any data authored offline to the server.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the current activity.

      • refresh

        public static void refresh(Context context)
        Refreshes the application data. Depending on connectivity, this function will set the question data for the application to the most recent data from the server, or from the user's locally cached data. Pushes any data authored offline once the user reconnects.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the current activity.

      • isFirstLaunch

        public static boolean isFirstLaunch()
        Returns:
        firstLaunch Whether this is the first launch of the application.

        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating whether an account is logged in or not

        Parameters:
        context - The context of the current activity.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the device is connected to a network.

        Returns:
